scripts.build-node-prod: gulp buildNode && tsc && gulp minifyNodeProd && gulp buildNodePackage && gulp removeTempFolders
scripts.build-web-prod: gulp buildWeb && tsc && gulp cleanWebJsFile && gulp minifyWebProd && gulp buildWebPackage && gulp removeTempFolders
scripts.build-web-dev: gulp buildWeb && tsc && gulp cleanWebJsFile && gulp buildWebDevPackage && gulp buildWebDevPackageFile && gulp removeTempFolders
